SELECT DISTINCT mu.id id, mu.`name` name, mu.parentid parentid, mu.sort sort, mu.url url FROM menu mu LEFT JOIN operate o ON mu.id = o.menuid LEFT JOIN role_operate ro ON o.menuid = ro.operateid LEFT JOIN role r ON ro.role = r.`code` LEFT JOIN manager m ON m.role = r.`code` WHERE m.state = 1 AND m.role = #{role} AND mu.parentid = #{parentid} ORDER BY mu.sort ASC
